doc:
Mark Webber (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_Webber_(actor) 0 Mark Allen Webber (born July 19, 1980) is an American actor, screenwriter, and director known for his roles in the films Snow Day, Weapons, and Scott Pilgrim vs. the World. Mark_Allen_Webber ( born July_19_,_1980 ) is an_American_actor , screenwriter , and director known for his_roles in the_films_Snow_Day , Weapons , and Scott_Pilgrim vs. the_World .
